name: EXE.terminate
description:
You're fond of browsing your computer, but as far as actually maintaining the thing, you are hopeless. Recently your computer has been acting strange, but today, it's been behaving very oddly. Navigate your computer menus to see if you can get it fixed!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Use your arrow keys to or WASD to navigate your surroundings and to interact with objects.

Warning: Some objects may be edible.

CREDITS:

Made in Adam Le Doux's Bitsy, using  Andrew Yolland's Borksy for the hacks in the game. Also uses Ruin's Image to Bitsy for a few images in the game.
